bibl.seg: TÖRÖK László, After the Pharaohs. Treasures of Coptic Art from Egyptian Collections. Museum of Fine Arts, Budapest, 18 March - 18 May 2005.
Budapest, Museum of Fine Arts, 2005, 4°, 279 pp., nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 963-9552-56-9.
I. Introduction. - II. History and Society in Late Roman, Byzantine and Early Islamic Egypt. - III. Catalogue [1-206]. - Bibliographical Abbreviations.

C.R. par Rosario Pintaudi, Aegyptus 86 (2006 [2008]) p. 320. - Marie-Hélène Rutschowscaya, RA 2007, pp. 428-430. - Thelma K. Thomas, JRA 20 (2007) pp. 661-662. - Marguerite Rassart-Debergh, Latomus 69 (2010) pp. 925-926.
